de.systemagmbh.interfaces.message
Interface ISysMessageConvertable

All Known Subinterfaces:
ISysBusEvent, ISysIndexableMessage, ISysMessage, ISysTable, ISysVariableValueMessage
All Known Implementing Classes:
ASysMessage, CSysStdMessage, DummyISysBusEvent, DummyISysIndexableMessage, DummyISysMessage, DummyISysMessageConvertable, DummyISysTable, DummyISysVariableValueMessage
public interface ISysMessageConvertable

All classes that implement this interface can become a ISysMessage.
